text: The Albany Democrat-Herald is a daily newspaper published in Albany, Oregon, United States. The paper is owned by the Iowa-based Lee Enterprises. The two daily papers publish a joint Sunday edition, called Mid-Valley Sunday. The Democrat-Herald covers the cities of Albany, Lebanon, and Sweet Home, Oregon, as well as the towns of Jefferson, Halsey, Tangent, Harrisburg, Brownsville, and Shedd. ==References== Category:1865 establishments in the United States Category:Newspapers in the United States
title: Albany Democrat-Herald
